page.title: 11GOVERMENT: POYNTINGTON AREA
page.content: {Dorset & Somerset}counties adjoin here, also 2 District Councils(West Dorset & S.Somerset) and 3 Parish Councils(Poyntington,Milborne Port & Corton Denham). Relatively similar services & rates apply in both districts but neighbours living across the county boundary may have to look elsewhere for the{services provided e.g.{state education-}Comprehensive School at Ansford, Som; Secondary/ Grammar School at Sherborne,Dorset; Tertiary College for all at nearby Yeovil. Social Services, Housing, Planning are at Sherborne/ Dorchester or Wincanton/Yeovil. Even mobile services - Library, Refuse Collection likewise Wessex Water,SEB & Postal Services from Dorchester serve the whole block, as does the Hospital at Yeovil, but Fire Brigade, Ambulance, Police are split along the boundry.
